scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover -x 'spec/*.spec.js' jasmine -- spec/*.spec.js && [ -z ${COVERALLS_REPO_TOKEN} ] || cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover -x 'spec/*.spec.js' jasmine -- spec/*.spec.js && open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
